author: narl_14
content: Hey, can someone help me know how are sequencers elected to sequence transactions? Are they selected from a validator set using an algorithm or are they completely controlled by the rollup operator or a trusted third party? What is the algorithm for selecting the sequencer for each rollup block? Would really appreciate a response. Thanks!

author: treyzania
content: It depends entirely on the rollup in question, it can be done in any way
